verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> he <S%G3332>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan;<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Have ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G314>read,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he which <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> female, <S%G2338><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> For this cause <S%G1752><s%> <S%G5127><s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4347>cleave<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> wife: <S%G1135><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1417>twain<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> one <S%G3391><s%> <S%G1519><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1417>twain,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath joined <S%G4801>together,<s%> let <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> put asunder. <S%G5563><s%>

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> <S%G4314>because<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> hardness of your hearts <S%G4641><s%> <S%G5216><s%> suffered <S%G2010><s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to put <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> wives: <S%G1135><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> so. <S%G3779><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> All <S%G3956><s%> men cannot receive <S%G5562><s%> <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G235>save<s%> they to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is given. <S%G1325><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G4198>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions.<s%>
